name: Love
description: Understanding God's love and how to love others
sampleQuestion: What does true love look like according to the Bible?

name: Forgiveness
description: Finding freedom through forgiving others and yourself
sampleQuestion: How do I forgive someone who has deeply hurt me?

name: Strength
description: Drawing on God's power in times of weakness
sampleQuestion: Where can I find strength when I feel overwhelmed?

name: Guidance
description: Seeking God's direction for life's decisions
sampleQuestion: How do I know God's will for my life?

name: Peace
description: Finding inner calm amid life's storms
sampleQuestion: How can I find peace in difficult times?

name: Wisdom
sampleQuestion: How can I gain wisdom to make better decisions?

name: Faith
description: Strengthening trust in God's goodness and power
sampleQuestion: How do I have faith when I can't see the way forward?

name: Hope
description: Finding hope in God's promises for the future
sampleQuestion: How do I maintain hope during dark seasons?

name: Prayer
description: Communicating with God and deepening relationship
sampleQuestion: How should I pray when I don't know what to say?

name: Comfort
description: Finding solace in God's presence during grief
sampleQuestion: Where can I find comfort when I'm grieving?

name: Courage
description: Being brave in the face of challenges
sampleQuestion: How can I be courageous when I'm afraid?

name: Joy
description: Discovering lasting joy that transcends circumstances
sampleQuestion: How can I find joy in the midst of hardship?
